data.title: Gabriel Lippmann
data.meta_description: Jonas Ferdinand Gabriel Lippmann ForMemRS was a Luxembourgish-French physicist and inventor, and Nobel laureate in Physics for his method of reproducing colours photographically based on the phenomenon of interference. His parents were French Jews.
data.text:
